author: struberg
msg: OWB-1048 only init sessionContext if the attribute is set
That way we prevent touching the session if we don't need.
And we also prevent sending out superfluous @Destroyed(SessionScoped.class) events

author: struberg
msg: our TCK Context SPI must use the internal ContextsService
If we use BeanManager#getContext() then we blow up with a ContextNotActiveException
